name: generator-icengbp
description: This Yeoman generator is based on the ngBoilerplate kickstarter developed by Josh David Millers, a best-practice boilerplate for any scale Angular project built on a highly modular, folder-by-feature structure. The original Yeoman generator was developed by Tim Hardy who perfected the ngBoilerplate in his generator. In this version I added TypeScript support and support for generating services and directives (see the readme.md)
